glosses: to catch rabies, to foam at the mouth because of rabies
to get furious, to foam at the mouth

examples.translation: I got away from there when he started to get furious

glosses: to get jealous, to get angry out of jealousy

examples.translation: I made the whole neighborhood get jealous with these diamonds
She turned around with an extreme excitement

glosses: to take a dangerous state or form, to get dangerous

examples.text: O iyice kudurdu ve kavga başlattı
examples.translation: He got extremely dangerous and started a fight

glosses: to get out of hand, to misbehave, to do wrong

examples.text: Siz de pek kudurdunuz, işyerine yakışır şekilde davranın
examples.translation: You guys got extremely out of hand, behave in a manner appropriate for a workplace

etymology: From Proto-Turkic *kutur- (“to go crazy”), related to kuduz (“crazy, rabid”)
